text: Ezɨ enselɨn aghuiba, akar kurabar gumazir men apanibagh amibav geir puvatɨ. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn enselbar faragha zuim Maikel, Mosesɨn kuam bagha Satan ko aning uaning adoghadogha Maikel akar kuratam Satanɨn mɨkemezir puvatɨ. A kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ekiam uabɨ nɨn atar nɨ mɨkemeghtɨma nɨ uan akam dɨkuagh.”
